definition: plaited matting (of rushes, bamboo etc)/silkworm basket/metal foil/foil paper
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Lay a sheet of aluminium foil over the pan.
sentences.chinese: 在盘子上盖一层铝箔纸。

sentences.english: Cover loosely with foil and bake for 1 hour.
sentences.chinese: 松松的的盖上一层铝箔纸，烘培1小时。

sentences.english: Its construction is entirely made of wood, waterproofed with foil.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥完全由木头建造而成，用铝箔纸来防水。

sentences.english: This design primarily aims at the circle pillar chocolates' aluminum foil packing.
sentences.chinese: 本设计主要是针对圆台柱状巧克力糖的铝箔纸包装。

sentences.english: Therefore, bearing in mind that foil business card printing and membership card making suitable to their needs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，给夺目铝箔纸的制卡和会员卡制作适性。

sentences.english: People place aluminum foil on the grill to keep the food from burning.
sentences.chinese: 人们铝箔纸放在烤肉架上，以防食物烤焦。

definition: rice paper/membrane of glutinous rice, used to wrap sweets etc
